title: Font similar to handmade sign (Repost)
content:
Hi,

Trying to find a font close to this sample. Only reference is a photo of the original routed wood sign. Trying to get close to the font used for Bridge and RV Park.  
Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks everyone!
